metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11831 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The PharStreamWrapper (aka phar-stream-wrapper) package 2.x before 2.1.1and 3.x before 3.1.1 for TYPO3 does not prevent directory traversal, whichallows attackers to bypass a deserialization protection mechanism, asdemonstrated by a phar:///path/bad.phar/../good.phar URL.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
